General.Name: Fujian Ideal Jewelry Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Fujian Ideal Jewellery Industrial Co., Ltd. designs and develops jewelry products. The company offers inlaid jewelry, finished diamonds, gold and colored gem jewelry, covering rings, necklaces, earrings, pendants, bracelets, brooches, and other categories. It sells its products under the IDEAL, CEMNI Millennium, CRAMER Diamond, and DIER ER brand names. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Ideal Jewellery Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Fujian Ideal Jewellery Industrial Co., Ltd. in June 2019. Fujian Ideal Jewellery Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Longyan, China.
General.Address: No. 14 Pearl River Building, Longyan, China
